Html:
Hi, i've decided to use HtmlAgility pack to resolve some features on my application.

This application manipulate Html files for sharepoint. The problem is that the users some times work with large files >20MB

And when the application try to load with HtmlAgility pack to parse, i'm getting Out of memory error.

Could be some issue?

it is a big issue for HAP.
i try to perf it. anyone give some clue?
